data.event: Orion was laid out on December 26, 1853, by Charles W. Dean.

event.title: are listed in the National Park Service's National Register of Historic Places: Central Park Music Pavilion – 1208

data.event: Two Orion locations are listed in the National Park Service's National Register of Historic Places: Central Park Music Pavilion – 1208 5th Street West Water Tower and Ground Storage Tank – 310 11th Avenue Public schools in Orion are governed by Orion Community Unit School District 223.
